title.narrative: Turkey Rapid Support for Micro and Small Enterprises during the COVID-19 crisis

description.narrative: The Project Development Objective (PDO) is to avert the closure of viable micro and small enterprises (MSEs) affected by the COVID-19 crisis and maintain their employment levels during the crisis.

condition.narrative: LA, Schedule 2, Section 1.A.2. By no later than thirty (30) days after the Effective Date, the Borrower shall develop, andintegrate into its information system, a financial management module for the purposes of the Project.

LA, Schedule 2, Section 1.A.3. By no later than thirty (30) days after the Effective Date, the Borrower shall purchase or develop,and operationalize an accounting system capable of recording Project transactions.

LA, Schedule 2, Section 1.B.1. and 1.C. The Borrower shall maintain, throughout Project implementation, the POM, in substance andmanner acceptable to the Bank, including the Reimbursable Support Financing Manual for the implementation of Part 1 and Part 2 ofthe Project.

LA, Schedule 2, Section 1.B.2. and 3, and 1.C. The Borrower shall carry out the Project, and cause the Project to be carried out,in accordance with the arrangements, procedures and guidelines set forth in the POM, and the Reimbursable Support Financing Manual.
LA, Schedule 2, Section 1.D.3 (c). The Borrower shall ensure that the first ten (10) Reimbursable Support Financings extended toMSEs shall be subject to the prior review and approval of the Bank.

LA, Schedule 2, Section 1.D.4 (b). The Borrower shall obtain a written agreement with each beneficiary MSE and Innovative YoungFirm that sets forth the terms and conditions for the Reimbursable Support Financing acceptable to the Bank, and rights adequate toprotect its interests and the interests of the Bank and the Guarantor.

LA, Schedule 2, Section I.A.1. The Borrower shall, throughout the implementation of the Project, to the satisfaction of the Bankoperationalize and maintain a PIU throughout Project implementation to, inter alia, oversee the management and broad implementationof the Project, to maintain the Reimbursable Support Financing schemes under Part 1 and Part 2 of the Project, to ensurebeneficiary MSEs compliance with the relevant terms of this Agreement, and to carry out the monitoring, evaluation and reportingrequirements for the Project.

The above legal covenant as written has not changed. However, certain details of the subprovisions to which it refers have changedand are described in the Amendment Letter to be sent to the client in the Restructuring Package.
